Let me recommend you this application
This application will allow you to share and download status.\n\n✔ Saved status will be displayed in this application for future use.

⦿ App Permission Details


➼ Internet Permission:
 ➼ To display Ads inside app
 ➼ Read/Write External Storage Permission:
 ➼ To load images / To Save files created in app

 We do not collect any personal information. We use third party services that may collect information used to identify you. Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app.

 ① Google Play Services

 ② AdMob

 ③ Firebase


⦿ Disclaimer:

 ① This application is not affiliated with WHATSAPP.

⦿ IMPORTANT

 This application is not affiliated, sponsored or endorsed by WhatsApp Inc.
 We are not responsible for any type of reuse of the media downloaded by the user.

 We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.



⦿ Contact Us
